header.title: wxSashWindow

description.p: wxSashWindow allows any of its edges to have a sash which can be dragged to resize the window. The actual content window will be created by the application as a child of wxSashWindow.
The window (or an ancestor) will be notified of a drag via a wxSashEvent notification.
